text: Eduard-Michael Grosu (born 4 September 1992) is a Romanian professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . He is the first Romanian to ride professionally. ==Major results== ;2008 : 2nd Time trial, National Junior Road Championships : Balkan Cadet Road Championships ::3rd Road race ::3rd Time trial ;2009 : 2nd Time trial, National Junior Road Championships ;2010 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Junior Road Championships ;2011 : 1st 20px National Cyclo-cross Championships : 3rd Road race, National Under-23 Road Championships ;2012 : 3rd Overall Tour of Trakya : 9th Grand Prix Dobrich II ;2013 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships : 1st 20px Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships : 1st Stage 3 Tour of Romania ;2014 : National Under-23 Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::2nd Time trial : 1st 20px Overall Tour of Estonia ::1st Points classification ::1st Young rider classification ::1st Stage 1 : 1st Stage 12 Tour of Qinghai Lake : 2nd Overall Carpathian Couriers Race ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stages 5 & 6 : 2nd Ronde van Midden-Nederland : 3rd Road race, National Road Championships : 7th GP Izola : 10th Overall Szlakiem Grodów Piastowskich ;2015 : 4th Gran Piemonte : 6th Grand Prix de Fourmies : 8th Brussels Cycling Classic : 9th Coppa Bernocchi ;2016 : 1st 20px National Cyclo-cross Championships : 2nd Time trial, National Road Championships : 9th Overall Tour of Taihu Lake ::1st Stage 5 : 9th Nokere Koerse ;2017 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships : 1st 20px National Cyclo-cross Championships : Sibiu Cycling Tour ::1st 20px Romanian rider classification ::1st Stage 4 : 9th Gran Premio della Costa Etruschi ;2018 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 1st 20px National Cyclo-cross Championships : Tour of Qinghai Lake ::1st Stages 3, 7 & 8 : Tour of Croatia ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stage 2 : 10th Three Days of Bruges–De Panne ;2019 : 1st Ronde van Limburg : Tour of Qinghai Lake ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stages 3 & 6 : 1st Stage 2 Okolo Slovenska : 1st Stage 2 CRO Race : 3rd Time trial, National Road Championships : 5th Route Adélie ;2020 : 1st 20px Overall Tour of Romania ::1st Stages 3 & 4 : 5th Paris–Camembert ===Grand Tour
